original_text: Then the men of Dan continued on their journey. Micah realized that they were too strong for him. So he turned around and he went home.
korean_text: 단 자손이 자기 길을 간지라 미가가 단 자손이 자기보다 강한 것을 보고 돌이켜 집으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then the men of Dan continued on their journey.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 단 사람들은 그들의 여정을 계속했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Micah realized that they were too strong for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 미가는 그들이 너무 강하다는 것을 깨달았습니다.
